name: firestore-roles-vuex-module
description: Vuex module for auth using firebase auth and firestore-roles system

scripts.check: if echo "$(node --version)" | grep -q "$(cat .nvmrc)"; then echo "Node version correct"; else echo "Node version does not match that in .nvmrc" && exit 1; fi
scripts.build: npm run check && npm run build:cleanbefore && npm run build:node && npm run build:lint
